Content.Text:
<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is the house you'll be living in
from now on. Let me give you a basic
explanation of the furnishings.

This is your <BLUE>kitchen</BLUE> and <BLUE>refrigerator</BLUE>.
In your kitchen you can <RED>cook</RED>.
Your refrigerator is for storing food.

This is your <BLUE>calendar</BLUE>.
You can look up each month's events and
birthdays on it.

This is your <BLUE>bed</BLUE>.
Use it when you sleep.

This is your <BLUE>closet</BLUE>.
You can change outfits to any clothes
it contains.

This is your <BLUE>bookshelf</BLUE>.
You can check your <RED>assets</RED> and
<RED>tutorials</RED> here.

The box on the right is your <BLUE>toolbox</BLUE> and
the one on the left is your <BLUE>storage</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
The toolbox is where you keep your <GREEN>axe</GREEN>
and <GREEN>hammer</GREEN> and other tools. The storage
is for all other items.

The storage is also where you keep
<GREEN>furniture</GREEN>, <GREEN>wallpaper</GREEN> and <GREEN>flooring</GREEN>
for your house.
<PAGE>
When you acquire new decor, try it
out!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
To use all the things that I just
explained to you, use the <BLUE>A Button</BLUE>.
All are essential, so use them fully!
